nodes.text: A human male individual resided in Phelar Port on the planet Eriadu during the time of the Galactic Empire. The young boy stole ration packs from an Imperial speeder, and was pursued by stormtroopers into a bar. As the thief pleaded for help, the bartender caught him, threatening to shoot him for bringing trouble to the bar. The stormtroopers entered the bar, demanding that the thief be handed over to them, and the former Imperial soldier Beilert Valance, angered by what his Imperial service had caused him, attacked the stormtroopers, defending the boy.
